attributes.review: I open the app expecting to find some good reason to support this man as a president and low and behold, I find nothing. I want to help better this country but when we have people who can’t do much as make an app make them look somewhat appealing, I am left with nothing. The app is useless unless you are already fully devoted to the man and if you are looking for a place to put your hope and future in, I don’t think it should be here. Remove this joke of an app from the store please @Apple.
attributes.title: Dysfunctional

attributes.review:

attributes.title: Worst app EVER!!

attributes.review: i had this app for not even 5 hours and mind you it took about a week to fully download the app and that’s never happened with other apps i’ve had previously. it glitched and hacked my amazon account! on top of that it almost leaked my credit card information as well. this app by itself is slow and freezes way too much. i thought this app would be good but i guess the other reviews were right😡!
attributes.title: hacked

attributes.review: This app is the worst thing I’ve ever downloaded. When I opened the app for the first time all the water in my house turned to BLOOD!!! “Okay” I thought, just a coincidence? I reopened the app and suddenly my house was overrun with frogs!! My dogs got lice and fleas, all my livestock died, the third time I opened it my house was swarmed with LOCUSTS!!! This app and whoever is behind it is a PLAGUE!! This thing needs to be removed from Apple so no one else falls victim to what my household went through.
attributes.title: Worst.App.EVER!!

attributes.review: okay so let’s start off by saying when i downloaded the app it made my phone burst into flames, and it took 2000 years to download. then trump popped out of my phone saying “ make america great again “ while smashing my phone with his ass. the app then turned back on and it started bullying me because i wore green shorts!! trump then started kissing my phone and giving it all sorts of diseases, like STD, chlamydia, etc. he then started to scream fake news. barron thankfully came to save me and kicked his father out the window. draco malfoy then zapped trump and yelled “ my father will hear about this “ malfoy hates muggles who have eenie teenie weenies.  when i was a young boy my father did not take me into the city to see a marching band so now i’m a lesbian.

attributes.review: I downloaded to see all the genius that is Trump and it made my phone glitch and it began to make my battery spark. Caught my iPad on fire due to the app. Why is this app even allowed, -100000/10
attributes.title: Almost made my phone explode🔥

attributes.review: This app is terrible and should not be allowed on the App Store it took about 4 weeks to install and when it installed it made my phone glitch so much that I had to get a new one. The app also played very inappropriate music and showed inappropriate videos. My dog died the second the app installed imagine it made my dog die and I’m trying to find a way to sue rn. Also after installing the app my phone flew all the way to Michigan where I had to go pick it up but when I got there all I saw was Minnie trump ninjas that attacked me and my daughter causing her to go to the hospital I never new the consequences that installing this app would have if I were to know I would have never installed I’m am now homeless because the Minnie trump ninjas took over my house.PLEASE DO NOT INSTALL THE I REPEAT DO NOT INSTALL THE APP this app should absolutely not be in the App Store it is to dangerous and yes I do not have a phone due to this anymore I am typing this from a rock😤
attributes.title: Worst app ever😤🙄🤬🖕🏽
